channel.title: Chem assignment on WebAssign, can anyone help?
channel.description:
Im stuck on 3 and 4.
4 is especially pissing me off because I have the correct answers according to the formula but everybody has a different rounded off number for each chemical and it changes the numbers. I'm hoping I did do something wrong so i can fix it.
Here is the link to the assignment:

item.title: Chem assignment on WebAssign, can anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

#3 use dimensional analysis to convert between units

#4 do M/(molar mass of empirical formula) then multiply the equation by this number

Read full topic
